TextView.android:text: Request for Reassessment of Real Property

To revise the Tax Declaration in order to correct its clerical error, conforms with the issued title, changes its improvement, depreciation or the physical obsolescence of the real property and/or annotate or cancel its encumbrances.
G2C - Government to Citizen\nG2G - Government to Government
Tax Declarant, Authorized Representative of the Declarant & Coordinating Offices
3. Barangay Treasurer's Office/ Municipal Treasurer's Office
5. Tax Clearance of Current Year (1 original copy)
2. Pictures of the Property in 2 angles (1 printed/electronic copy)
3. Certified Copy of Title (1 original copy)
3. Department of Agrarian Reform or Registry of Deeds
5. Registered Real Estate Mortgage or Bail Bond (1 original copy)
6. Notarized Certification of Released of Real Estate Mortgage/Court Order of Bail Bond (1 original copy)
1. Accomplishes Request Form and submits the required documents.
1.1. Provides Request Form and evaluates the required documents according to the Checklist of Requirements.
- If the evaluated documents are incomplete, asks for the Checklist of Requirements Form and secures the lacking documents.
1.2. If the submitted documents are lacking, returns the submitted documents. Advises client to secure the required documents and gives a copy of the Checklist Form. End of Service
- If the required documents are complete, accomplishes the Sworn Statement.
1.3. If the required documents are complete, let the client accomplish the Sworn Statement.
2.4. Checks data entries & photocopies the documents
2.5. Prints the FAAS, Tax Declaration, NOA & Inspection Report
2.6. Verifies & signs the printed and supporting documents
2.7. Uploads of the Geo-package to PASSO Tax Mapping Department via email
3.1. Records documents in the logbook. Issues the assessment documents to the client.
4. Accomplishes the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) form and drops in the feedback drop box.
4.1. Gives CSS form for service feedback. Instructs the client to place the accomplished CSS form in the feedback drop box.
